sentences.en: a demonstration by people opposed to blood sports
sentences.cn: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

sentences.en: An Olympic gold medal is the most sought-after prize in world sport.
sentences.cn: 在世界体坛上，一枚奥运会金牌是最令人向往的奖项。

sentences.en: By a curious twist of fate, cricket was also my favourite sport.
sentences.cn: 让人感到惊奇的是，板球碰巧也是我最喜欢的运动。
k将您的看法以电子邮件形式发送至sport@times.co.uk。

sentences.en: Eric was sporting a new camelhair coat.
sentences.cn: 埃里克得意地穿了一件新的驼绒大衣。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: He did not particularly want to take up a competitive sport.
sentences.cn: 他并不特别想从事竞技体育运动。

sentences.en: He has produced his own sports magazine called Yes Sport.
sentences.cn: 他推出了自己的体育杂志，叫做《是的，体育》。

sentences.en: Her children have inherited her love of sport.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子们继承了她对运动的热爱。

sentences.en: I have assumed the name was given more or less in sport.
sentences.cn: 我猜，取这个名字多少是出于寻开心。

sentences.en: I have been a shooter for 16 years and enjoy my sport.
sentences.cn: 我从事射击运动已经16年了，很喜爱这项运动。

sentences.en: In sport, it's usually men who grab the headlines.
sentences.cn: 在体育方面，新闻人物通常是男性。

sentences.en: She's not as mad about sport as I am.
sentences.cn: 她不像我对体育那么痴迷。

sentences.en: Since then, the authorities have tried to clean up the sport.
sentences.cn: 从那以后，有关当局已努力整顿体育界。

sentences.en: The sport is still little known.
sentences.cn: 仍然很少有人知道这项运动。

sentences.en: There's nothing except sport and repeats on TV.
sentences.cn: 除了体育节目和重播节目外，电视上没什么新鲜内容。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: Wendy decided the sport was not for her.
sentences.cn: 温迪认定这项运动不适合她。

trans.tran_en: an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing
an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing

trans.tran_cn: 嬉戏，得意地穿戴，故意显示
trans.tran_en: to be wearing something or have something on your body and show it to people in a proud way
